caption:
This photograph captures a serene sunset scene featuring a silhouette of a person engaged in fishing by a body of water. The image prominently showcases the setting sun in the background, casting a warm, golden glow that reflects off the waterâ€™s surface. Clouds lightly streak the sky, enhancing the dramatic effect of the sunset.

The person, visible only as a silhouette, is standing on the shore, characterized by an uneven, rocky edge. They are holding a fishing rod, poised in an attentive stance as if waiting for a catch. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and contemplative, highlighted by the rich hues of the sunset and the calm water. The composition effectively uses the silhouette and the natural lighting to create a striking contrast and focus on the activity of fishing in a tranquil environment.
title: Fisherman at sunset on Lake Washington at Renton. Lake Washington was dying of pollution caused by sewage. Under the Metro program, sewage has been diverted to a treatment plant in Seattle, which discharges the treated residue into Puget Sound. The elimination of all sewage dumping into the lake has greatly improved its water quality.
